ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Bard% was (Patch message)
ygData.msgSnippet: It s not better enough to where anyone with infravision will mem it and use it. desparate dirge does damage, just not as much as you would like in a pve
ygData.messageBody:
It's not better enough to where anyone with infravision will mem it and use it.
desparate dirge does damage, just not as much as you would like in a pve
environment.

At 10:12 PM 2/26/01 +0000, you wrote:
> > well, for all the wood elf and half elf bards or bards with mask of
>deception or guise of the deceiver, they don't get a song at level
>24 then (ultravision song). how about if we compare the ratio of
>human bards with no mask to the total number of bards with the ratio
>of pvp players to non pvp players?
>
>Um, last time I checked, Ultravision (Mask, UV Song) was MUCH better
>than Infravision (Half Elf, Wood Elf), so your comparison is more
>like comparing any bards without a mask to the total number of bards
>with the ratio of pvp players to non pvp players.
>
>Try again. :)
